snippet: The kidnappers had demanded to be compensated for the detention of one of their relatives and sought the return of land they say they own, a tribal spokesman said.
abstract: Italian Embassy security officer who had been kidnapped by Yemeni tribesmen has been released unharmed.
lead_paragraph: The kidnappers had demanded to be compensated for the detention of one of their relatives and sought the return of land they say they own, a tribal spokesman said.
